name: Ecommerce with Hierarchy and ABAC Scenario
description: This scenario demonstrates the use of Hierarchy and ABAC (with Entities) in AWS Verified Permissions. It allows sellers to sell car if department matches the car's department.

policies.description: Allows sellers to sell car if department matches the car's department

tests.description: User 1 is allowed the ability to sell (action) porsche car (resource).
User 1 is denied the ability to sell (action) porsche car (resource), due to not matching departments.
